Text: Don't you hate whining motherfuckers ;-) Thanks STGstylah, nice one mate. It's a great album, and at 320 who would have thought anyone could complain. Respect!

3astUpRoaR is wrong but it's cool. The title of the first album is 'House of Pain'. It 'IS' the first release. I own ALL their music, the albums and the remixes too. 'House of Pain' is the debut album from House of Pain, Released: July 21, 1992. The logo on the cover, which reads "Fine Malt Lyrics", is often referred to as the name of the album but is IS NOT. The 'Fine Malt Lyrics' is part of the House of Pain logo. It's on ALL their gear from back in the day.
In my opinion this is the best album by them.  There's not one song on this album I didn't like.  I use to listen to this song constantly back in the day, non stop for days!!!  Thanks for the DL
I think i had the CD a logn time ago but sold it. Bad mistake;(
